no_internet_connection_screen_subtitle: Please you internet connection and try again
add_duel_screen_item_question_descriptio: Write your question so that the answer is only yes or no. Keep it short and simple. Example: “Will Germany get gold in Olympics 2024?”
add_duel_screen_item_deadline_descriptio: Choose the date and time when the duel will end
add_duel_screen_item_resolves_descriptio: When the duel ends, choose who picks the winners. It can be you or Duel Duck.
add_duel_screen_item_resolves_duel_duck_: Add source of true. It is needed to check the final result. For example: coinmarketcap.com/. Don’t use vague links like google.com
add_duel_screen_item_price_description: Choose the ticket cost for your duel for other users who want to join in
add_duel_screen_item_fee_description: The fee is how both you and we earn money. We split it 50/50. It's taken from the prize pool of the winners, which consists of fees from participants who guessed correctly.
add_duel_screen_publish_description: press on “yes” or “no” to publish this duel
